mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HH_USER (ID, PW, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE_NUM, ROLE) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{realName}, #{email}, #{phone_num}, 'ROLE_USER' )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HH_USER WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HH_USER WHERE NICK_NAME = #{nickName}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HH_USER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}

SELECT BAN_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BAN_STR, 'YY/MM/DD') AS startDay, TO_CHAR(BAN_END, 'YY/MM/DD') AS endDay FROM HH_USER H, BAN_HISTORY B WHERE H.ID = B.ID AND B.ID = #{userId} AND BAN_STR <= SYSDATE AND BAN_END >= SYSDATE
